title: What are some upcoming books by Chetan Bhagat in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I am not sure about that. Though he has just released his New Novel “The Girl in Room No 105” in October 2018. It was just a good Read. Also, the Book won the “The Most Popular Award 2018” from Amazon. Check it out at his official Facebook Page Here: Chetan Bhagat For all his books you can check out this Page: http://www.yurbookstore.com/hot-deal-download-all-books-of-chetan Hope it was useful Happiee Reading :)
